reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic hotel and staff despite refurb work going on. Room an staff were great. Only issue wS hog water ran out on final morning due to builders. Staff were great and offered a discount to compensate.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a weekend in London for shopping and a show. A friendly welcome with warm mince pies on reception. Room looked freshly done, very modern and comfortable, so much so we overslept on Sunday! All the staff were helpful, from the receptionist to the doorman. Good atmosphere in the bar, definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Perfect Weekend

reviews.text: Staff were very friendly when we checked in and as a bonus our room was ready early. I found the hotel lovely and warm unlike the comment below. We stayed at the weekend so I guess the hotel and area was quiet unlike work days.
